ModMetaData.name: AlbinoFluffies
ModMetaData.author: Rihlsul
ModMetaData.description: This mod makes big fluffy white rabbits (hares). This mutant Hare is easily spotted since it is huge and white, possible arising from some strange things involving a rabbit, rum, and a Megasloth. The extra fluff makes them sturdy in the cold and the duller under-fluff can be sheared. They're strangely bright and can be trained.
